EmailTemplate.description: Technical Publications T53/T55 Engine Access Request
EmailTemplate.name: Tech Pubs T53-55 Access Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Honeywell Tech Pubs Request {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting the Honeywell Aerospace Technical Publications Team on with your request
for T55/T53 engine technical publications.
But before we can start the processing the request, we need your help. The publications you’re asking for
Are available under either a three year license agreement with Honeywell or a single year subscription.
Based on your aircraft you are entitled to:
To accept the license, just reply to this email and include your signed license agreement (attachment).
Your request will be reviewed and processed by our Tech Pubs Team. We will set up your subscription
and invoice you for $3000.00 for the three year term.
If you do not want to sign the license agreement and instead opt for the single year subscription, please
confirm your acceptance of the one year term and we will set up your subscription and invoice you $10,000.00
A team member will contact you if additional information is needed or to set up your subscription.
Here’s your unique tracking number: {!Case.CaseNumber}. You can use this number to track our progress.
For Case Related Questions?
We’ll connect all of your inquiry details through the subject line of this email. So, when you reply, please leave the subject line unchanged to make sure your response is routed immediately to this case.
Thanks again! We appreciate your business,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName} Honeywell Aerospace Technical Publications Team Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099
ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
This e-mail message and any attachment(s) are for the use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain proprietary and/or confidential information, which may be privileged or otherwise protected from disclosure. Further, information contained herein, U.S. Export Control laws may control including attached files. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure or distribution of this communication in whole or in part without the express written consent of Honeywell, or the U.S. Government as required, is prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient(s), please contact the sender by reply email and destroy the original message and any copies of the message as well as any attachment(s) to the original message.
